title: Pierre Bergounioux
text: Pierre Bergounioux (born 1949 in <a href="Brive-la-Gaillarde">Brive-la-Gaillarde</a>, <a href="Corr%C3%A8ze">Corrèze</a>) is a French <a href="writer">writer</a>. He won the 1986 <a href="Prix%20Alain-Fournier">Prix Alain-Fournier</a> for his second novel, "Ce pas et le suivant". And in 2002, he won the <a href="Soci%C3%A9t%C3%A9%20des%20gens%20de%20lettres">SGDL</a> literary grand prize for his body of work.
